slra.simulation

Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • slra.simulation.Camera

  • public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
    Camera Class Represents the camera through which the world is viewed. (Represents the view of the telescope in this program)
    Author:
    Henry Valentine based on thebennybox 3D game engine tutorials
